name: Foggy Labs
tag_list: app, development, ios, android, iphone, ipad, mobile, newsstand
overview:
Foggy Labs is a mobile app development startup based in Curitiba, Brazil.

What does Foggy Labs do? Foggy Labs provides services to create iPhone, iPad and Android apps with the latest features of iOS and AndroidOS. Foggy Labs also creates Newsstand apps for publishers of any content, like magazines and newspapers, with interactive features such as videos, audios, links.

What problem does Foggy labs solve? Foggy Labs gives companies, startups and individuals a way to increase their brand presence on the mobile devices, like smartphones and tablets. Through the apps, they can create marketing campaigns, provide services, show and sell their product portfolios and engage with their audience. Through the Newsstand apps, publishers can provide a digital reading solution for their content, and also have a new channel to sell ads to advertisers.

Who is it for? The services provided by Foggy labs are for companies, startups, publishers and individuals.

Where are Foggy Labs apps available? Once published, iOS apps are available on the App Store, iTunes, and if publishers opt in, Newsstand. Android apps are available on the Google Play.
